DOC.brief_summary: This is an Open-label, prospective, randomized, multi-center post-market study.
DOC.brief_title: OsseoScrew Versus Fenestrated Pedicle Screws Augmented With Polymethylmethacrylate
DOC.detailed_description: To collect clinical evidence of safety and efficacy of the OsseoScrew Spinal Fixation System versus fenestrated pedicle screws augmented with polymethylmethacrylate (PMMA) in patients with Osteoporosis or Poor Bone Quality
